title: Hypnotic state: Catalepsy / The body becomes rigid / Non-verbal hypnosis with Dr. Paret
description:
Catalepsy is a waxy pliability in the musculature of the body. This state makes the subject posable like a doll. Lift the arm up and then let it go, and the arm stays right where you left it.
Catalepsy can occur in small muscles groups, or through the entire body. If your eyes are closed, and then you go into catalepsy, you’ll find that you can’t open them. Of course, you must accept that suggestion in order for it to be fulfilled. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school.
